alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, Mainland Monroe, Miami-Dade and Broward Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 858 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shark Valley Obs Tower, or 19 miles west of Homestead General Airport, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Loop Road Ee Center, Dade- Collier Training Airport, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Mahogany Hammock, Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook, Wilderness Waterway, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Everglades National Park, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Fortymile Bend, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley and Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
